title: Android 13 DP2: New Material You dynamic color theme styles and how to use them
content:
For Android 13, Google has been working to expand Material You’s dynamic color system to offer different color theme styles. Here’s how to try them out early.

more…

description: For Android 13, Google is expanding Material You's dynamic color system with different color theme styles. Here's how to try them out early.
